DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate safety immunogenicity ( non-inferiority ) Purified Chick Embryo Cell Vaccine ( PCECV ) administer two different schedule ( conventional versus abbreviate schedule ) healthy adult 18 50 year age China
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity ( Non-inferiority ) Purified Chick Embryo Cell Vaccine Vaccine Administered Two Different Schedules ( Conventional Versus Abbreviated Schedule )
DOC.criteria: Male female subject 1850 year age : good health time entry study determine medical history , physical examination clinical judgment investigator ; volunteer simulate postexposure vaccination course blood draw ; give write informed consent ; inform consent must obtain subject enrolment study ; available visit schedule study . Subjects criterion exclude : pregnancy unwillingness practice acceptable contraception participation study ; history rabies immunization ; significant acute chronic infectious disease may impact subject 's safety /or immunogenicity Investigators opinion time enrolment ; fever ≥ 38.0°C ( axillary ) or/and significant acute chronic infection require systemic antibiotic antiviral therapy within past 7 day enrolment ; treatment corticosteroid , immunosuppressive antimalaria drug two month period enrolment ; administration vaccine within past 14 day enrolment ; known/suspected immunodeficiency , autoimmune disease , immunologic disorder ; history allergy egg protein ; know hypersensitivity neomycin , tetracycline , amphotericinB , vaccine component ; treatment parenteral immunoglobulin preparation , blood product , and/or plasma derivative within past 3 month ; mental condition render subject unable understand nature , scope consequence study ; participation investigational trial within past 3 month enrolment ; plan surgery study period ; intention leave area study site end study period ; condition , opinion investigator , might interfere evaluation study objective .
